alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 28 at 7:39PM CDT until July 02 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Nebraska... Platte River near Darr affecting Dawson County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Platte River near Darr. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, flooding of the low lying land right along the river can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CDT Wednesday was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected remain near 10.5 feet through Friday. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
